mid_core.title: Courier Message July 12th - 23:49
mid_core.content:
From: redwing@protonmail.com
To: frostpoint@securemail.cz
Subject: YHF

Use the old wall with the gate — Where the invisible lines point to the middle, check the map. It's a tight fit, but dry and out of sight. Can’t see it unless you’re right next to it.
Remember, listen to the lady. Go at night

mid_core.title: Tapped phonecall July 11th - 11:07
mid_core.content:
Male Voice 1:
-You sure you've found the right place?
Male Voice 2:
-Has to be. Narrow as hell. Lines cross right above it.
Male Voice 1:
-Isn't that area too busy?
-CONNECTION LOST-

content.text: Recording of a short wave radio signal. It's a known number station that recently became active again. Relevance: pending analysis.

images.description: Blurry photo of what looks like a bird carving on a stone wall. Possibly a sign or marking for finding the drop
Tight alleyway with pedestrian signal. May lead to drop zone or be part of approach route.
A screenshot of a map of Prague with markings on it, relevance high
Corrupted photo of Ruins on a hilltop. May be unrelated or an old access point.

advanced_additions.title: Courier Message (Locked)
advanced_additions.content: Same content as Mid-Core once unlocked.

advanced_additions.title: Encrypted Memo
advanced_additions.content:
FIELD REPORT — VYHLÍDKA BASTION

Upper overlook gate remains unpatched as of 3 June.
Camera array failure confirmed by field tech.
Area marked 'non-priority' by command.

— ENCR. OPS TEAM
